archimate:BusinessFunction.name: Relatie met marktpartijen onderhouden
archimate:BusinessFunction.documentation: Het vermogen om relaties met marktpartijen te onderhouden inclusief het registreren van marktpartijen zoals energieleveranciers, Programma verantwoordelijken (PV)/Balance responsible party (BRP), Meetverantwoordelijken, BSP’s, CSP’s, aggregators

properties.value: The ability to maintain relations with market parties, including the registration of these market parties, e.g. energy supplier, balance responsible party (BRP), Aggregators, ...
